attributes.action: Make E-Scooters Legal in the UK
attributes.additional_details: To make youths get around more easy
attributes.background: Allow people to ride them on public roads

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Legalise all E-Scooter usage where bicycles can be used: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618517

Legalise and incentivise uptake of personal electric vehicles: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614282
